name: Courthouse Square
description: A tranquil oasis in the heart of the city, where a sprawling pond and lush green space have replaced the cracked asphalt of a forgotten parking lot. The water is a startlingly clear blue, and the grass is a vibrant, almost artificial, green. A few families enjoy picnics on the grass, their laughter echoing in the clean, filtered air. A holographic swan glides across the pond, its movements graceful and unnervingly perfect. It's a place of serene beauty, but you can't shake the feeling that the perfection is just a little too perfect, a little too clean, a little too... manufactured.
